fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make a map and select a person. Anyone who is visiting that person will follow your map, but it's erroneous, so they are led to three other random people's houses before they reach your target. In other words, they will visit three different people before they visit your target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Extra results from people who used your map will be given to you. They will only receive the feedback of the first person they visited.
- Since they visit the three other random people first, anyone's visit to your map target will have the lowest priority.
- With the Necromonicon, you can replace a red or dark red tile with a green tile, or replace a black tile with a white tile. Also anyone who visits your target will be basic attacked.
